title: ITOS365 Wooden Multi Remote Control Holder/Stand/Organizer/Rack for Space Saving 5 Slot TV Remote Control Storage Organizer Caddy
features: Remote control organizer rack featuring a convenient curved shape and a sleek black finish
The curved,design keeps all 5 slots arranged so that the remotes you store inside will be easy to see and easy to reach
Eye-catching shape has been hand worked with passion and attention to detail
Gifted artisans from India have used wooden crafting techniques passed down over generation, combined with simple tools to create products of great beauty & utility
description: Keep all your remote controls organized and easy to find with this convenient storage rack. Thanks to the 5 slots arranged in a convenient Floral design Wooden organizer rack allows you to keep up to 5 remote controls perfectly in place and within easy reach. Forget tedious minutes spent hunting down the remote that you need - with this Wooden remote control caddy, all of your remotes can be kept safely stowed and easy to find.Convenient table top holder features a stylish curved stair step shape that keeps up to 5 remote controls in view and easily accessible. No more lost or misplaced remotes! Slim design takes up very little space on you coffee or end table. Approximate Dimensions: 6.8" x 8" x 3.9"
